Moeldoko Jelaskan Kebutuhan untuk Posisi Wakil Panglima
07 Nov 2019, 12:38 by Pradipta Rahadi


Moeldoko Jelaskan Kebutuhan untuk Posisi Wakil Panglima

KBRN, Jakarta : Kepala Staff Kepresidenan Moeldoko membenarkan usulan dari dirinya mengenai posisi Wakil Panglima. Moeldoko yang pernah menjabat sebagai panglima TNI, merasakan betul kebutuhan sosok wakil panglima dalam melaksanakan tugas dan pekerjaan.
Moeldoko menjelaskan, posisi wakil panglima diperlukan untuk mengisi dan mengerjakan pekerjaan yang berkaitan dengan Panglima TNI agar tidak ada kevakuman. Ia juga menegaskan, keberadaan Wakil Panglima tidak akan menimbulkan dualisme kepemimpinan dalam tubuh TNI. 
"Setelah saya disitu selaku panglima, banyak tugas keluar panglima itu. Melihat ke depan. Karena posisinya sebagai pengendali operasi. Panglima banyak melihat keluar banyak kunjungan, mengecek kesiapan pasukan, dan sebagainya, sehingga saya memandang kalau begitu perlu wakil panglima. Pertemuan antar panglima ASEAN, pertemuan antara Panglima di Pasifik dan kawasan lain, sehingga banyak bilateral meeting dan seterusnya. Dengan pertimbangan itu, saya memberi masukan perlu ada wakil panglima, sehingga kalau panglima pergi, tidak perlu buat surat. Selama ini panglima pergi, buat surat, menunjuk salah satu kepala staff angkatan bertindak sebagai panglima. Kalo nanti tidak perlu lagi karena panglima dan wakil panglima dalam satu kotak." Tutur Moeldoko menjelaskan kepada wartawan di kantornya Kamis (7/11/2019).
Dengan keberadaan wakil panglima, maka apabila panglima pergi kunjungan, wakil panglima bisa mengisi kekosongan tersebut.  
"Panglima di atas wakil panglima dibawah. Sehingga kalau panglima tidak ada, wakil panglima bisa melakukan kerja. Itu bedanya. Jadi tidak ribet, lebih mudah, dan efektif melakukan organisasi. Itu aja sebenernya." Tambah Moeldoko.
Seperti diketahui, Presiden Joko Widodo akan kembali mengadakan seorang wakil Panglima TNI untuk membantu Panglima TNI. Berdasarkan informasi yang disampaikan Staff Khusus Presiden Bidang Komunikasi Fadjroel Rachman, Presiden Jokowi sudah memiliki kriteria khusus untuk sosok yang akan diberi tugas khusus oleh Presiden untuk membantu Panglima TNI. 
Ketentuan tersebut tertuang dalam Perpres Nomor 66/2019 tentang Susunan Organisasi TNI yang diteken Presiden Jokowi pada 18 Oktober 2019 lalu. Jabatan Wakil Panglima TNI sebelumnya terakhir kali dijabat Jenderal (Purn) Fachrul Razi di era Presiden Abdurrahman Wahid tahun 1999-2000.

Moeldoko Explains the Need for Deputy Commander Position
Nov 7 2019, 12:38 by Pradipta Rahadi


Moeldoko Explains the Need for Deputy Commander Position

KBRN, Jakarta: Presidential Chief of Staff Moeldoko confirmed his proposal regarding the Deputy Commander's position. Moeldoko, who had served as a TNI commander, felt the need for a deputy commander in carrying out his duties and work.
Moeldoko explained that the position of deputy commander was needed to fill in and do work related to the TNI Commander so that there was no vacuum. He also emphasized that the presence of the Deputy Commander in Chief would not lead to dualism of leadership within the TNI.
"After I was there as Commander in Chief, there were many tasks to leave the Commander. Looking ahead. Because of his position as the operational controller. The Commander saw many visits coming out, checking the readiness of the troops, and so on, so I saw that a deputy commander in ASEAN was needed. , the meeting between the Commander in the Pacific and other regions, so that there are many bilateral meetings, etc. With that in mind, I give input there needs to be a deputy commander, so that if the commander leaves, there is no need to make a letter. the chief of staff of the force acts as the commander. Then there will be no need because the commander and deputy commander in one box. " Said Moeldoko explained to reporters in his office Thursday (11/07/2019).
In the presence of the deputy commander, then if the commander goes on a visit, the deputy commander can fill the vacancy.
"The commander is above the deputy commander below. So if there is no commander, the deputy commander can do the work. That's the difference. So it's not complicated, it's easier, and effective to do the organization. That's just it." Add Moeldoko.
As is known, President Joko Widodo will once again hold a deputy TNI Commander to assist the TNI Commander. Based on information conveyed by the President's Special Staff for Communications Fadjroel Rachman, President Jokowi already has specific criteria for someone who will be given a special task by the President to assist the TNI Commander.
These provisions are contained in Presidential Regulation No. 66/2019 concerning the Organization Structure of the TNI, which was signed by President Jokowi on 18 October 2019. The position of Deputy TNI Commander was previously the last held by General (Retired) Fachrul Razi in the era of President Abdurrahman Wahid in 1999-2000.
